analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ nasavitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo savitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ naavitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo avitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na kusalam na avitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ avitakka vicāra mattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ naavitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato avitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dvādasa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate dvādasa.
analyzed: na kusalam na avitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ avitakka avicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā dvādasa ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate dvādasa
